name: VoidShift (MaidAndReady)
description:
Jump between dimensions in this Arena shooter! Use your movement to outmaneuver your enemies and to chain together combos to get the highest score

Enemies in one dimension show up as a silhouette in the other, so use this dimension hopping to get out of sticky situations or to chain together a longer combo. Bigger combos give a higher score, but watch out! The only way to heal is to melee enemies, so be careful on taking damage. Powerups such as shotguns, sniper rifles and a rocket launcher will spawn randomly across the arena to give you an edge in combat.

Made for the 2022 Global Game Jam. Theme: Duality
